##Data Dimensions: 585,159 observations x 36 variables

[Link to Metadata](https://metadata.phila.gov/index.html#home/datasetdetails/67e305ddcd04851f076dc40f/representationdetails/67e305ddcd04851f076dc422/?view_287_page=4)

##Data Dictionary

+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| Field Name                | Alias                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Type      |

| address                   | Address                               | The property address as recorded by the Office of Property Assessment.\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Text      |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | For certifications linked to a retired OPA account, this is the base address for a currently active account with lineage to the listed OPA account, provided for reference only. For instance, if a property consisting of a 3-floor building split into apartments was converted into 3 separate condo units, the address will reflect the address (minus any unit numbers) of one of those current condo unit accounts. The certification, however, is only valid for the scope of the property reflected by the original OPA account. |           |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| lhhp_cert_date            | Lead Certification Date               | The date the certification or exemption initialized. This will usually be the date of the passing inspection, or the date the exemption statement was submitted and/or verified.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Date/Time |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| lhhp_certification_status | Lead Certification Status             | The current certification status of the property, updated daily. However, eClipse does have access to the most recent changes for the purposes of license applications.\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Text      |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | If a property has a pending Lead-Free certification but a complete Lead-Safe certification, this will show the property Certified (with type Lead-Safe); if the entire property has been certified Lead-Free and was not previously certified Lead-Safe, the property will show Pending (with type Lead-Free). If any of the units have expired certification (and the property is not exempt), this will show Expired.\                                                                                                                 |           |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | If a property is exempt but has nonetheless supplied valid certification details, this will show Certified; if that certification is Pending or Expired, this will show Exempt.\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |           |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | Certified\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |           |
|                           |                                       | Pending\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |           |
|                           |                                       | Expired\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |           |
|                           |                                       | Exempt\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |           |
|                           |                                       | Not Certified\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |           |
|                           |                                       | Unknown                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |           |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| lhhp_status_type          | Certification Status Type             | The type of certification or exemption.\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Text      |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | If a property has a mix of Lead-Free and Lead-Safe certifications among the units on the property, this will show Lead-Safe. Lead-Free certification meets and exceeds the requirements for Lead-Safe certification, so this reflects the certification that applies to the property as a whole.\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | Lead-Safe\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |           |
|                           |                                       | Lead-Free\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |           |
|                           |                                       | Built after 1978\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | Dorm\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |           |
|                           |                                       | Hotel\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |           |
|                           |                                       | Retired\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |           |
|                           |                                       | None                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |           |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| li_rl_init_issue_date     | Rental License Initial Issue Date     | The date the Rental license number reported in li_rl_license was initially issued, if one exists.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Date      |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| li_rl_units               | Number of Units (Rental License)      | The number of units for rent on the Rental license reported in li_rl_license, if one exists.\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Numeric   |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | If the property has multiple units and one is owner-occupied, this number is one less than the total units on the property. Once a rental license is issued, this number cannot be changed except by obtaining a new rental license.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |           |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| li_rl_mrec_issue_date     | Rental License Most Recent Issue Date | The date the Rental license number reported in li_rl_license was most recently issued (or renewed), if one exists.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Text      |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| opa_building_category     | OPA Building Category                 | The property building category assigned for this OPA Account Number by the Office of Property Assessment, included here for reference.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Text      |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| opa_year_built            | OPA Year Built                        | The actual or estimated year the property was built, according to the Office of Property Assessment.\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Text      |
|                           |                                       | \                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |           |
|                           |                                       | Properties built after 1978 do not require lead certification or inspection, but still must file a statement of exemption in order to obtain a rental license.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |           |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| opa_building_category     | OPA Building Category                 | The property building category assigned for this OPA Account Number by the Office of Property Assessment, included here for reference.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Text      |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
| zip_code                  | OPA ZIP Code                          | The property's five-digit ZIP code as recorded by the Office of Property Assessment                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Text      |
+---------------------------+---------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+
